short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enriches Mapp Acquire's user interface capabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enriches Mapp Acquire's user interface capabilities. It makes the product easier to use by non-technical users, e.g. to select css paths on websites.
